description:
Jarret is a cute lil thing!
He about 5'6" and can't weigh more than 130 pounds. If you like your guys small, and maybe just a little submissive, he's the boy for you!
A former Navy boy, he's Out and looking for work. He's got a very serious boyfriend, and we've been talking about maybe getting him to come in having the two of them do a scene together.
He's got some great Navy stories too. I really had no idea that things do get pretty naughty on a ship.
title: Jarrett - Solo
